name: Animal Sounds: Flashcards for kids and toddlers
name_original: Animal Sounds: Flashcards for kids and toddlers
description:
Amuse your kids with the best selection of animal sounds for toddlers, babies & kids. For extra entertainment we added HD flashcards that look astounding and reflect the appropriate sounds. They are great for learning and keeping your kid interested in learning more and more words and sounds. It is an educational app for kids with ultra-fun content. We included other sounds besides the pet animal sounds, like fish, cars & instruments. Just download the animal noises and animal sounds for kids and enjoy high quality sound effects!

GREAT FUN SELECTION OF ANIMAL SOUNDS
The animal noises and sounds are numerous. Simply tap any of the animal flashcards and the animal sounds app will play the sound in high quality. The sounds are for few seconds and toddlers can also quickly change and go from one sound to other. Animal sounds for toddlers that are included are: dog, cat, horse, donkey, sheep, pigs, but also lions, zebras, rabbits and much more.

LOTS OF OTHER AMUSING SOUNDS TOO
Kids will love to listen and enjoy the other sounds we included too. There are different fish from the sea world, car sounds for kids and instrument sounds for kids as well. Let your kids explore different worlds and learn different sounds. Repeat some sounds if your kids giggle and react positively to them. Have fun! The app is absolutely free and educational that helps smart kids to learn sounds of animals and first objects.
